subject: Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The noise Alex Rodriguez and his team have been making has been successful in diverting attention from accusations that he used drugs to an investigation he says has been abusive.
snippet: The noise Alex Rodriguez and his team have been making has been successful in diverting attention from accusations that he used drugs to an investigation he says has been abusive.
